Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast

Class InstructionBL

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.Instruction
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionOneArg
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.InstructionBL
public class InstructionBL
extends InstructionOneArg
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for the assembly language instruction BL.
